FuncDef:
The vlan command sets a VLAN ID for the NQA VPLS MAC ping test instance.
The undo vlan command deletes a specified VLAN ID.
By default, no VLAN ID is configured.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies a VLAN ID.
It is an integer that ranges from 1 to 4094.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
If both the destination MAC address and the specified VLAN need to be matched, set a VLAN ID.
